article_title: Obama Group Hawks Obamacare With Cute Animals
article_text: The Adorable Care Act moniker has been around the Internet for awhile, as a grass roots supporter created a Tumblr account with that name in July. In September the Adorable Care Act became a Twitter handle and made its way onto Facebook. Meanwhile, the White House and OFA said they had nothing to do with pairing fuzzy animals with pro-Obamacare slogans.

article_metadata.title: Obama Group Hawks Obamacare With Cute Animals

og.description: OFA has adopted some fuzzy surrogates to sell the American public on Obamacare.

article_summary:
In September the Adorable Care Act became a Twitter handle and made its way onto Facebook.
The Adorable Care Act moniker has been around the Internet for awhile, as a grass roots supporter created a Tumblr account with that name in July.
Meanwhile, the White House and OFA said they had nothing to do with pairing fuzzy animals with pro-Obamacare slogans.
